name: Deeper Well
description:
Summary

In "Deeper Well" you can build your own small town. The main source of food and the center of your population is a small but not inconspicuous well in the middle of the city. In the beginning you have only a few resources and farmers at your disposal. But the more your city grows, the more you can build. To continue to supply your population, you must dig the well deeper and deeper. This is the only way to keep them alive.

Controls

WASD - Camera Movement

R - Rotating when building

With the FastForward buttons you can manipulate the Timescale (1x, 2x, 4x).

Team

Our second LDJam and fourth game jam in sum now.

Milmalissa - Digital Artist - responsible for all the art you see, from models, to textures to UI Elements.

manio - Music Director - he composed the soundtrack.

ThePeat/Feraligatr - Lead Developer - implementing the architecture, UI and features. If you have turned into our stream, you have seen him doing his work.

Foreign Assets

Font - Enchanted Land (https://www.dafont.com/enchanted-land.font)

Stone Street & Dirt Street Texture - "Five Seamless Tileable Ground Textures",
